original_text: For whosoever shall commit any of these abominations, even the souls that commit them shall be cut off from among their people.
korean_text: 이 가증한 모든 일을 행하는 자는 그 백성 중에서 끊어지리라

sentences.original_text: For whosoever shall commit any of these abominations
sentences.korean_translation: 누구든지 이 가증한 것들 중 어느 것이라도 행하면

sentences.original_text: even the souls that commit them
shall be cut off from among their people
